amendment.description: Amendment requires the FBI to report on the number of petitions it was not able to make a determination on within the 10-day period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-14 to require the FBI to report on the number of petitions it was not able to make a determination on within the 10-day period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 144 (Roll no. 100).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Schneider.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schneider amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 144 (Roll no. 100).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
